about_the_game:
After a devastating raid by monsters, a once-thriving village lies in ruins. It's up to you to rebuild the village from the ground up. Explore the world to gather resources, face formidable bosses, and gather blueprints to craft new tools and construct buildings. As you help villagers with quests and restore their home, you'll earn their trust—and uncover the mysteries of the land.

  • Rebuild the Village: Gather materials from caves and forests to craft tools and rebuild homes, shops, and key structures.

  • Fight Epic Bosses: Battle fierce monsters guarding powerful loot like blueprints and upgrades that will transform your village.

  • Help the Villagers: Take on side quests to earn rewards and strengthen your bond with the townsfolk, unlocking new features and abilities.

  • Craft and Upgrade: Build everything from basic tools to advanced structures, expanding your village’s potential with each new blueprint you discover.

Can you bring peace and prosperity back to the village and defend it from the dangers that lurk beyond?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Apple M1
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
